result.name: nutrient-data-for-autumn-2018-and-spring-2019-in-the-celtic-sea
result.notes:
Nutrient concentration data collected on the RV Cefas Endeavour as part of 
CEND17_18, CEND03_19 and CEND04_19, including concentrations of nitrite, 
nitrate, ammonia, phosphate and silicate. Samples were collected for use in 
eutrophication assessments and to test the Ferrybox water sampler. 

Samples were collected using three different methods:


(  1.)Manually from the continuous flow (CF) with mercuric chloride added.
(  2.)Manually from the continuous flow then frozen.
(  3.)Automatically with a water sampler attached to the Ferrybox with 
      mercuric chloride added.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Nutrient data for autumn 2018 and spring 2019 in the Celtic Sea

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: CSV, ESRI Shapefile. The data can also be accessed via the WFS and WMS protocols.
resources.name: Cefas Data Portal
